category.name: Integration.CATIA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CATIA_import_missing_shape_action
preference.preference_description: Defines the action to perform when there are missing shapes. Possible values: - NONE = Ignore missing shapes and continue the process. - WARNING = Prompt the user to continue or stop the process. - ERROR = Process is stopped with an error message.
